title: What Type of Traveler Are You?
description: Discover your travel personality and ideal vacation style!

questions.text: How do you plan your trips?

answers.text: Detailed itinerary with every hour planned
No plans - I go with the flow
Research all the must-see attractions
Find the best local food spots
Pack days in advance with a checklist
Throw things in a bag last minute
Pack for every possible scenario
Leave room for souvenirs and local goods
Highly-rated hotel with great amenities
Wherever I end up - hostel, Airbnb, camping
Centrally located for easy sightseeing
Local neighborhood with authentic restaurants

questions.text: How do you handle travel mishaps?

answers.text: Stressed - I had everything planned!
It's all part of the adventure
Quickly research alternatives
Find a local spot to eat while I figure it out

questions.text: What's the highlight of any trip?

answers.text: Seeing everything on my bucket list
Unexpected discoveries and experiences
Visiting famous landmarks and attractions
Trying authentic local cuisine

questions.text: How do you choose your destination?

answers.text: Compare reviews and make pros/cons lists
Wherever feels right in the moment
Somewhere with rich history and culture
Places known for incredible food scenes

questions.text: Your camera roll after a trip is full of:

answers.text: Organized photos of each planned activity
Random candid moments and people
Every major landmark and tourist spot
Pictures of every meal I ate
Efficient - maximize every minute
Slow and relaxed - no rush
Active - always on the move seeing things
Leisurely - with plenty of meal breaks

questions.text: How do you interact with locals?

answers.text: Ask for recommendations from my research
Strike up conversations and make friends
Join guided tours to learn the history
Ask where locals actually eat

questions.text: What do you bring home from trips?

answers.text: Photos organized in albums with dates
Stories and memories
Souvenirs from famous sites
Local spices, ingredients, or recipes

results.description: You're detail-oriented and love having everything mapped out! Your trips are efficient, well-researched, and stress-free because you've thought of everything. You maximize your time and rarely miss must-see attractions. Your organizational skills ensure smooth travels and you always know where you're going next.

You're spontaneous and embrace the unexpected! Your best travel memories come from unplanned moments and random discoveries. You're open to wherever the journey takes you and connect easily with people along the way. Your flexible attitude turns mishaps into adventures and leads to authentic experiences.

You're driven by discovery and want to see it all! You research destinations thoroughly and create bucket lists of must-see places. You're energetic about visiting landmarks, learning history, and experiencing different cultures. Your enthusiasm for exploration and thirst for knowledge make every trip educational and exciting.

You travel through your taste buds! For you, the best way to understand a place is through its food. You seek out authentic local cuisine, from street food to fine dining. You're always asking locals for restaurant recommendations and your trip highlights revolve around memorable meals. Your adventurous palate leads you to unforgettable culinary experiences.
